tests.title: should update the data of one user to be like the other
tests.fullTitle: API Routes Test should update the data of one user to be like the other
tests.code:
request(appUrl)
  .patch('/api/v1/users/')
  .set('Authorization', authToken)
  .send({ name: 'user4', email: 'user4@gmail.com' }) // Update user1 to have the same data as user2
  .expect(400) // Expecting a 400 error because users cannot have duplicate names
  .end(done);
